Uses of Class
station.StationOfflineException

  • Packages that use StationOfflineException 
    Package Description
    controller  
    station  
    ui.clui  

    • Uses of StationOfflineException in controller

      Methods in controller that throw StationOfflineException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NetworkManager.rentBike(int userId, int stationId, int bikeType, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime, Network net)
      This methods makes a user rent a bike of a specified type.
      void NetworkManager.rentBike(int userId, int stationId, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime, Network net)
      This methods makes a user rent a bike, without taking care of the type.
      double NetworkManager.returnBike(int userId, int stationId, java.time.LocalDateTime returnTime, Network net)
      This method makes a user return a bike.

    • Uses of StationOfflineException in station

      Methods in station that throw StationOfflineException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Station.dropBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime dropTime)
      This method allows to drop a Bike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has an ongoing Ride and if there is an available Slot.
      double PlusStation.dropBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime dropTime)
      If a User drops a Bike in a PlusStation, he gains 5 Time Credits on his subscription Card (if he has one).
      void Station.pickUpBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a Bike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a Bike available
      void Station.pickUpElectricBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a ElectricBike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a ElectricBike available
      void Station.pickUpMechanicBike(Card card, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime)
      This method allows to pick up a MechanicBike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has no ongoing Ride and if there is an a Slot with a MechanicBike available

    • Uses of StationOfflineException in ui.clui

      Methods in ui.clui that throw StationOfflineException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommandLineReader.interpreteCommand(java.lang.String instruction, CommandLineController clc)
      This method calls the method of the CommandLineController corresponding to the instruction.
      void CommandLineController.rentBike(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      rentBike <userID> <stationID> <bikeType> <time> <networkName>
      The time has to be on the following format: YYYY-MM-dd HH:mm The type has to be electric or mechanic.
      void CommandLineController.returnBike(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      returnBike <userID> <stationID> <time> <networkName>
      The time has to be on the following format: YYYY-MM-dd HH:mm
